name: Spacesuit
description: You must equip this before going to the floating garden or discovery pod.

actionResponse.look: You must equip this before going to the floating garden or discovery pod.
actionResponse.get: You put the spacesuit in your inventory.

name: Uniform
description: A uniform given to members of the galley staff

actionResponse.look: A uniform given to members of the galley staff
actionResponse.get: You put the uniform in your inventory.
actionResponse.use: You put on the uniform. Very fancy!

actionResponse.get: You put the pepper shaker in your inventory for later

actionResponse.look: A Rock might be laid on the mountain
actionResponse.get: You put the rock in your inventory. It's heavier than it looks!

name: Giant Snail Shell
description: There’s no one living here anymore!

actionResponse.look: There’s no one living here anymore!
actionResponse.get: You put the giant snail shell in your inventory. Ew, slimy!

name: Snowflake Crystal
description: An oddity that won’t melt, but holds the same sparkle as a snowflake!

actionResponse.look: An oddity that won’t melt, but holds the same sparkle as a snowflake!
actionResponse.get: As you pick up the crystal, you feel a surge of power flow through your body. You put the crystal in your inventory.

name: Frog Fossil
description: You can see the frog's skeleton in the rock.

actionResponse.look: You can see the frog's skeleton in the rock.
actionResponse.get: You put the fossil in your inventory.
You carefully pick up the glass and put it in your inventory.

name: Flour
description: A small satchel of flour that makes your hands powdery.
